config.CursorLightIntensity.label: Cursor light intensity
config.CursorLightIntensity.desc: How bright the cursor light should be
config.CursorLightBind.label: Cursor light key
config.CursorLightBind.desc: What key turns the cursor light on / off
config.CursorLightHold.label: Hold to show
config.CursorLightHold.desc: Whether the key must be held to show the light, or is toggled when pressed
config.PlaceBind.label: Place item in world
config.PlaceBind.desc: Press this key while holding an item to place it in the world
